main event: A UFO was observed in Marengo, Indiana, on January 23, 1955, for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The observation was made by a civilian source,The nature of the object was classified as one unidentified phenomena,The conclusion indicated it was possibly an aircraft,The required forms and sketches for detailed reporting were referenced,The object was observed from the ground and seemed to move silently.
witness description: a civilian from the local area
